programme.title: Maniac Cop 2

programme.desc: An avalanche traps three hikers in one of three tales of terror.

programme.desc: Zombie cop Officer Matt Cordell's third ride from beyond the grave has him looking for a girlfriend.

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: An adaptation of "Frankenstein" in which a married couple of scientists create a modern-day monster.

programme.title: Possession
programme.desc: A woman's (Sarah Michelle Gellar) brother-in-law awakes from a coma claiming to be her husband.

programme.title: A Deadly Lullaby
programme.desc: After losing her child, Olivia (Katie Leclerc) meets a woman and her daughter and becomes obsessed.

programme.title: FilmRise Horror
programme.desc: Scream along to horror classics like GINGER SNAPS, DAY OF THE DEAD and DRACULA, and witness weird supernatural tales starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Sydney Sweeney, Dan Stevens and other stars.

programme.desc: A team of ghost hunters is determined to capture the spirits of their loved ones.
